unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather affecting yields is a constant worry, no? Especially for us farmers in UP! Remember the 2015 droughts? My chacha ji in Allahabad lost half his crop. This year (2024) too, things aren't looking good. Kab hogi achhi baarish? Need a good monsoon before 15/07/2024, else Diwali will be grim! Maybe Krishi Vigyan Kendra can help? 09:30 hrs meeting next Tuesday. Let's hope for the best after 05/08/2024! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather affecting yields is a constant worry, no? Especially for us farmers in U P! Remember the two thousand and fifteen droughts? My chacha ji in Allahabad lost half his crop. This year (two thousand and twenty four) too, things aren't looking good. Kab hogi achhi baarish? Need a good monsoon before fifteenth july two thousand and twenty four, else Diwali will be grim! Maybe Krishi Vigyan Kendra can help? nine thirty hours meeting next Tuesday. Let's hope for the best after fifth august two thousand and twenty four! Jai Kisan!
